item.title: 샘김 - Love Me Like That (드라마"알고 있지만")
item.description:
I get defensive
and insecure
My own worst critic
behind a closing door
I’m fragile
and fractured
That’s
for sure
I burned myself
down to the ground
Oh can I
ask of you
To treat me
soft and tender
Love me
hard and true
Keep my heart
from building walls
So high
you can’t get through
Treat me
soft and tender
Woo can you love me
like
Can you love me
like
Can you love me
like that
Woo can you love me
like
Can you love me
like
Can you love me
like that
I just
keep repeating it

you didn’t catch me

like

like
Can you love me
like that
Can you love me
like that
You see
the world in colors
I see
in black and white

out of the lines
That I live in
all of the time

soft and tender
And love me
hard and true
I burned myself
down to the ground
Oh can I

To treat me

like

like

like that

item.title: 샘김 - Mama Don't Worry

할 일이 많이 생겼죠
